###第四章 想他
Chapter 4: Miss Him
“二弟，让人去查查，我倒是想看看那个不想活了的，竟然敢嚼我妹妹的舌根！”叶洛阴沉的道。
"Second Brother, go get someone to investigate on this matter. I want to see who has the audacity to do this to my sister!" Ye Luo said sullenly.
“什么！他说你恶心！”三人的脸一下就阴沉了下去。
"What!?! He said that you're disgusting!?!" The faces of her three brothers grew sullen.
“你怕是巴之不得才对吧。”叶漓心中暗嘲。
'You'd probably be more than happy if that happens.' Ye Li sneered and thought to herself.
“先说这些话的都是我们班上的同学，我也不知道她们从何得知。”
"The ones who started saying these were my classmates. I don't know how they found out either."
“哥哥，我不怪你，要怪就怪我瞎了眼吧，不过没关系，我已经看清楚了他的真面目了，我以后再也不会喜欢他。”叶漓摇了摇头，看着三哥自责，她也无比心疼。

"Brother, I don't blame you. I can only blame myself for being blind, but it doesn't matter, I've already seen his true colors clearly. I won't fancy him anymore from now on." Ye Li shook her head, looking at her Third Brother who was ridden with remorse, feeling extremely heartbroken.
“哦？那好吧。”这次叶漓没有生气，反倒是笑着附和了一声。
"Oh? Okay then." Ye Li was not enraged this time. Instead, she smiled and agreed.
"Hello?"
“大哥二哥三哥，你们不用担心，我没事。”叶漓瓮声瓮气的道。
"Big Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, don't worry, I'm alright," Ye Li said in a hoarse voice.
“大哥二哥三哥，我知道了，我不会再这样了，这一次要不是因为同学们嘲笑我，我也不会想不开...”叶漓低着头擦了擦眼角的湿润，伤心的说。

"Big Brother, Second Brother, Third Brother, I know, I won't do this again. If my classmates hadn't mocked me this time, I wouldn't have let my emotions rule over my head..." Ye Li said miserably as she hung her head low and rubbed the tears at the corner of her eyes.
“大小姐和叶眉小姐关系那么好，你当然不会欺负她的。”司机肯定的说。
"Missy and Miss Ye Mei are on such good terms with each other. Missy, of course you wouldn't bully her," the chauffeur said firmly.
“妈，我姐不会有事吧？”叶眉担忧的问道。
"Mother, my sister will be fine, right?" Ye Mei asked worriedly.
“姐姐怎么样了，还好吗？她是不是又闹了，我跟她关系最好，要不要我去劝劝她？”叶眉又关心的问。
"How is Sister? Is she alright? Is she making a scene and throwing a tantrum again? I'm the closes to her. Should I go and talk some sense into her?" Ye Mei asked with concern.
“害，我确实不懂。”司机大叔憨憨的抓了抓头发，“不过大小姐这样看起来真的好看。”
"I really don't," the chauffeur said, scratching his head foolishly. He continued, "But Missy really looks good now."
“小妹，以后万不可再做这样的傻事了知道吗？哥哥们知道你喜欢于向阳，以后再也不会逼你嫁给徐凤年了。”另一个长相十分斯文，看起来书生气息颇浓的男人无奈又心疼的劝道。

"Little sister, don't ever do such a foolish thing, alright? We, your brothers, know that you fancy Yu Xiangyang and we'll never force you to marry Xu Fengnian again," said another scholarly-looking man who seemed mild-mannered. He felt helpless and took pity on his younger sister.
“怎么了？你要是受不了这个委屈，我也不介意去帮你讨个公道？”叶漓直接了当的笑。
"What's the matter? If you can't take it lying down, I won't mind standing up for you and doing you some justice." Ye Li laughed straightforwardly.
“怎么天天都是这些东西？”她不悦的往后一靠，没有看向看过来的秦柔母女，反而是看向了一旁站着的女佣。
"Why do I get served these stuff everyday?" She leaned backwards in displeasure and stared at the maid at the side instead of Qin Rou and Ye Mei.
“我不怪你们，我知道你们是为了我好才会让我同徐大少订婚，而且这是妈妈的心愿，我也想要帮她实现。”叶漓下定决心道。
"I don't blame you guys. I know you wanted me to marry Young Master Xu for my own good. Besides, it's also Mother's wish. I want to fulfill it for her," Ye Li said after making up her mind.
“我也不知道，我要和老...徐大少订婚的消息不知道被谁传播了出去，同学们都在说，我要嫁给那些年纪大的老男人做老婆，还说我之前那么有钱，就是被人包养，明明都不是这样的，可大家都这样说，这让我日后要怎么见人？”叶漓一句老公差点脱口而出。

"I don't know, the news of my engagement with Hub... I mean, Young Master Xu, was somehow spread by someone. My classmates all said that I'm marrying an old man and that I must be able to live a luxurious life because I'm the mistress of a wealthy man. That's obviously not the truth but now that they're saying such things, how am I going to face anyone in the future?" Ye Li almost blurted the word 'Hubby'.
“我是死了吗？不然为什么会见到哥哥他们？”她瞪着美目，不可置信的喃喃。
"Am I dead? Otherwise, how can I see my brothers?" Her beautiful eyes were wide open and she was muttering in disbelief.
“我觉得之前的还是要好看一些，还能遮住你的缺点。”她有意无意的强调。
"I still think that your previous hairstyle looks better. At least, it can hide your flaws," she deliberately emphasized in a passive-aggressive manner.
“是吗？”她若有所思的看了叶眉一眼。
"Is that so?" she asked, looking at Ye Mei, seemingly filled with thoughts.
“是啊阿漓宝贝，你吓死哥哥了，你要是出了一点事，要哥哥们日后怎么办呀。”蓝发男同样是一脸伤心。
"Yeah, Baby Li, you scared us. If anything happens to you, what are we supposed to do in the future?" the man with the blue hair said, looking just as sad as the others.
“是啊阿漓，你不是喜欢向阳吗？你要是喜欢，哥哥怎么也得帮你拿下他，我们也不想你不幸福。”叶枫也是认同道。
"Yeah, Li, don't you like Xiangyang? If you fancy him, I must help you win his heart no matter what. We want you to be happy too," Ye Feng chimed in.
“是，他是说我恶心，说我仗着自己跟三哥哥的关系就纠缠他！”叶漓眼泪汪汪的告状。
"Yeah, he said that I'm disgusting and that I keep pestering just because I'm Third Brother's younger sister!" Ye Li complained with tears in her eyes.
“没事就好，昨晚上我就想去看你了，但是哥哥他们不让，我才没有去看你。”
"Good that you are. I wanted to go see you last night but Brothers didn't allow me to so I didn't."
“眉儿，学校...”叶枫正想问学校关于那些流言的事情，就被叶旬扯了一下，他顿了顿，转了个语气问：“学校那边麻烦你帮老师说一声，阿漓可能要休息一段时间再过去。”

"Mei, the school..." Ye Feng was just about to question her about the rumors that had been spreading in school when Ye Xun tugged him. Ye Feng pause and continued with a different tone, "Please inform the teacher in school that Li has to rest and recuperate for some time before returning to school."
“等等，阿漓你怎么了，不爱吃没关系呀，我让厨房的人给你换就是了，怎么动这么大的火？再说了，这位厨师是我阿姨我特意给你招来的营养师，你之前不是还很喜欢他做的菜吗？”秦柔人如其名，柔声柔气的开口。

"Wait, Li, what's the matter with you? It's okay if you don't like the food, I'll just get the chef to prepare something else. Why are you getting so angry? Besides, the chef is a nutrition I specially hired for you. Didn't you use to love the food she cooks?" Qin Rou asked tenderly, her voice as gentle as her name. [1. 'Rou' means 'gentle' in Chinese.]
“能有什么事情，全世界最好的医生都请回来了。”秦柔有些不屑，但话说的很小声。
"What can happen to her? They've already hired the best doctors in the world," Qin Rou said softly with some disdain.
“行了，都别说了，让阿漓好好休息一下吧。”叶洛见妹妹脸色不大好看，开口道。
"Okay, enough, let Li get some rest," Ye Luo said when he noticed that his younger sister looked a little unwell.
“让管家换个厨师。”叶漓将自家面前的营养餐推到了一边，站了起来，不容拒绝的说。
"Get the butler to hire a new chef," Ye Li said assertively, pushing the nutritious meal away before standing up. She would not take no for an answer.
“这不就是你保持身材的好秘诀吗？我现在想减肥，自然得学着你一点，不然如何瘦的下去，你说是不是？”叶漓一脸天真的看她。
"Isn't that your secret method for staying in shape? I want to lose weight now, so I naturally have to learn from you. Otherwise, how can I lose weight?" Ye Li said, looking at her innocently.
“那你的眼光还真挺独特，大家都觉得不好看，就你觉得好看。”叶漓若有所思的看她。
"You've got a unique taste then. No one except you thinks that my previous hairstyle was nice," Ye Li said, looking at her ambiguously.
“那就好。”叶漓上了餐桌，看着自己面前的营养餐，皱了皱眉。
"Good to hear." Ye Li walked to the desk and frowned after seeing the nutritious meal in front of her.
“那真是委屈你了。”
"You must be aggrieved."
“阿姨不必这么麻烦，我看妹妹的营养师就不错，日后她吃什么，我就吃什么吧。”叶漓通情达理的道。
"Auntie, you don't have to go to that trouble. I think Sister's nutritionist is great. From now on, I'll eat everything she does," Ye Li said in an understanding manner.
“阿漓你能想开最好。”愤怒的叶枫终究是无奈的叹了口气。
"Li, it's good that you can figure it out and get over it."The infuriated Ye Feng sighed helplessly in the end.
“阿漓宝贝，你好好休息，这件事就交给哥哥们去查，一定不会让你白受了委屈，不要再想不开了好吗？有什么事情就告诉哥哥，但凡敢有人再说你半分，哥哥势必要让他后悔来到这个世界！”老三叶枫摸了摸妹妹的头，安抚着保证道。

"Baby Li, rest well. Leave this matter to me and your brothers to investigate. I'll make sure you won't suffer for nothing. Don't be upset about it anymore, alright? If there's anything, just tell us about it. If anyone dares to criticize you again, I'll make sure he regrets being born in this world!" the third brother Ye Feng comforted his younger sister reassuringly while stroking her head.
“阿漓，你不要为难，哥哥们知道错了，不应该逼你，你不要有压力。”叶旬担忧的看着突然转变的妹妹，总感觉这次自杀之后，妹妹的性格变了。

"Li Li, don't feel conflicted. We know that we're at fault for forcing you. Don't feel pressurized," Ye Xun said, looking worriedly at his younger sister who had a sudden change in attitude. He felt that her personality had changed after she tried to commit suicide.
“阿漓，你到底怎么了？哪里不舒服告诉哥哥们好吗？”
"Li, what's wrong with you? If you're feeling unwell, tell us, okay?"
“阿漓，你终于醒了！”
"Li, you've finally come to!"
“阿漓，对不起，哥哥没想到他会这样对你。”叶枫猩红着一双眼，要不是他给自家妹妹介绍了于向阳，她也不会喜欢上他，最后被伤到这种境地。

"Li, I'm sorry, I never thought he would treat you that way," Ye Feng said with bloodshot eyes. If he hadn't introduced Yu Xiangyang to his younger sister, she wouldn't have fallen in love with him and ended up getting hurt to such an extent.
“难道是我看错了？”秦柔柳叶眉微皱，觉得自己应该是想多了。
"Were my eyes playing tricks on me?" Qin Rou muttered with a frown, feeling that she should have thought too much.
【热！枫神&心若向阳，昔日好兄弟反目当街动手！】
"Hot topic! Best Buddies God Feng and Beloved Xiangyang Turn Against Each Other And Fight On The Street!"
一个是娱乐圈当红大明星，一个是偶像剧男神，随便一个出一点事情，都会在网络上引起风浪的两个人，突然动起了手，大家自然是十分震惊。

One was a famous celebrity in the entertainment industry while the other was a popular idol who often starred in idol dramas. Any incident that they were involved in would cause a huge uproar on the internet. Yet, both of them got into a fight. Everyone would naturally be astonished.
一行三人上了车。
The trio got inside the car.
一身白嫩如同婴儿一样的肌肤，在灯光的照射之下白到发光。
She had supple and tender skin that was like that of a baby's and under bright light, it was fair and almost glowing.
三个哥哥却没有注意到她的脸上变换的表情，因为刚刚叶漓那番话，都让三个男人几乎失去理智。
However, Ye Li's brothers did not notice the change in her expression because the three of them had almost lost their rationality after hearing her words just now.
三个哥哥离开之后，叶漓躺了回去。
Ye Li lied down again after her three brothers left.
三个哥哥都很优秀，都是人中之龙，可偏偏就她叶漓，干啥啥不行，犯错第一名。
All three of her brothers were very outstanding and impeccable. However, unlike them, she was not good at anything at all, and was best at making mistakes.
三个大男人随便一个出去，都是能掀起一阵风浪的风云人物。
The three grown men were all powerful figures who could easily cause an uproar.
三个男人对视一眼，都从彼此眼中看到了相同的想法。
The three men looked at each other, and all saw the same thought in each other's eyes.
三个男人看着她脸上翻腾的喜色，着实是觉得怪异。
The three men found her joyous expression to be extremely bizarre.
三个阴沉着一张脸站着的男人在看到女孩初醒的瞬间，一下围了上去，表情如出一辙的担忧。
Three men with somber expressions immediately crowded the girl immediately after they saw her regaining consciousness. They all looked extremely worried.
三人倒抽了一口气。
The three men gasped.
三人对视一眼，惊愕过后就是惊喜，“阿漓，你真的不怪我们了吗？”
The three of them looked at each other in shock, after which they said with some surprise and joy, "Li, do you really not blame us anymore?"
三人更是震惊，“你的意思是，你愿意跟徐凤年订婚？”
Greatly taken aback, the three of them asked, "Do you mean that you're willing to get engaged to Xu Fengnian?"
三人脸色铁青。
The three of them turned pale.
三人闻言，惊愕的看她。
The three men looked at her in shock after hearing their words.
三人闻言，顿时变脸：“什么？同学们嘲笑你？他们为什么要嘲笑你？谁敢嘲笑我们叶家的小公主，不想活了？”

Upon hearing her words, their expressions changed and they asked, "What? Your classmates mocked you? Why did they mock you? Who has the audacity to mock the little princess of the Ye Family? Do they have a death wish?"
三兄弟对视一眼，眸光中带着奇怪的光，叶洛沉声道：“不必，阿漓现在还很虚弱，你就不要上去打扰她了，有什么话留着明天说吧，我们还有事出去一趟，阿漓要是起来了，就通知我们。”

The three brothers looked at each other with peculiar gazes while Ye Luo said in a low voice, "You don't have to. Li is still very weak now, don't go upstairs to disturb her. If you have anything to tell her, save it for tomorrow. We have some matters to attend to so we're going out now. Inform us if Li wakes up."
三哥哥就更不用说了， 作为大明星的他，除了上课时间，其他的时间，行程都是排得满满的。
On the other hand, her third brother was obviously busy as he was a famous celebrity. Apart from going to school, the rest of the time in his schedule would be fully lined up with activities.
上辈子她所遭受的，必将要两人百倍奉还！
She would make them pay for all the suffering she had been through in her previous life, a hundredfold!
上辈子她最恨三位哥哥和爸爸，觉得是他们非要逼着自己嫁给徐凤年，毁了自己一辈子的幸福，所以一直对他们怀恨在心。
In her previous life, she hated her three brothers and father the most for forcing her to marry Xu Fengnian and thus ruining her lifelong happiness. Hence, she had always born a grudge against them.
上辈子的叶漓就很喜欢她的性子，甚至还曾希望过，要秦柔是她的妈妈就好了。
In her previous life, Ye Li liked her temperament, and even wished that Qin Rou was her mother.
上辈子自己自杀被救回来之后，本就对哥哥们恨到了极点，又听叶眉这话，直接把他们当仇人一样对待。
In her previous life, she was filled with extreme hatred towards her brothers after she was rescued from her suicide attempt. When she heard Ye Mei's words, she treated them like her enemies.
上辈子遭受了这一切的叶漓，性格也变得十分胆小自卑，甚至在叶眉的各种劝说之下，差点跑去医院整容。

Ye Li, who had suffered all of that in her previous life, had also become extremely timid and she even developed an inferiority complex. In fact, she even almost went to the hospital to get plastic surgery under Ye Mei's various persuasions.
下一秒，她的眼睛猛地睁开，扩散的瞳孔在一瞬间收缩，脸上还带着愤怒和惊恐绝望。
In the next second, she opened her eyes abruptly and her dilated pupils constricted immediately while infuriation, panic, and despair were written all over her face.
下定了决心，叶漓起身去了浴室洗漱。
Having made up her mind, Ye Li got up and went to the bathroom to wash up.
不管如此，这辈子，她绝对不允许那样的事情发生了。
No matter what, she would never allow that to happen again in this lifetime.
不讨人喜欢不说，身材还差，好几次叶漓都在怀疑，自己是否亲生，不然为何家中随便一个都是颜值顶峰的强者，就她那般平凡？

Not only was she unlikable, she did not have a gorgeous figure either. On several occasions, Ye Li even suspected if she was their biological daughter. Otherwise, how could she have such ordinary looks when all the other members of her family were extremely good-looking?
不过秦柔和叶眉都是聪明人，知道如何放低身份，也十分懂事，不吵不闹，这些年来倒是获取了不少人的好感。

However, both Ye Mei and Qin Rou were smart enough to know how to swallow their pride, stay humble, behave themselves and not cause any trouble. Hence, over the years, they managed to get into the good books of many people.
与此同时，一栋欧式豪华风格的别墅二楼，书房内，穿着白色衬衫的男人正坐在书桌前工作，他脖颈处的纽扣微微解开了两颗，从作者这个角度隐约可见的能看到几分肌肉线条，给男人增添了几分性感。

At the same time, there was a man seated in front of a desk in the study on the second floor of a European-style luxurious mansion, and doing some work. He was wearing a white shirt which had two unbuttoned buttons. The outline of his muscles could be seen vaguely, giving him a sexy, masculine charm.
世界上最完美的三个男人，都是她的哥哥，最疼她最宠她，可上辈子的自己却恨了他们半辈子。
The three most perfect men in the world were all her brothers, who loved and pampered her the most. However, in her previous life, she hated them for half a lifetime.
两个觊觎自家家产的人，会那么为她着想？
How could two people who coveted her family's wealth be so concerned about her wellbeing?
两方原本和睦的粉丝纷纷在网上开始互相指责了起来，事情闹得很大，几乎一打开手机就是这个新闻。

Their respective fanclubs which initially got along with each other harmoniously, began blaming each other and the matter soon escalated and got blown out of hand. The news were almost rampant and would show up on everyone's mobile phone.
两方都没有出来澄清，这事大家也不知道到底是谁的错，也都在猜测着。
Neither party came forth to clarify matters and no one knew who was at fault. They were all just making speculations.
之前她对二小姐的话，可是唯命是从的，甚至只听得进去她的话，别人给的建议，她反倒是充其不闻。
Previously, Ye Li had always went along with every suggestion Ye Mei made. In fact, Ye Mei was the only person she listened to and she would ignore ev everyone else's advice.
之前就是因为脸大，所以叶漓才会留那么多的刘海，还天真的以为遮挡了大脸盆，就能漂亮。
Previously, Ye Li decided to have bangs because of how large her face was. She even naively thought that she would look better with the bangs covering her face.
之后一家人的关系都降到了冰点。
Afterwards, her relationship with her family became extremely strained.
之后叶家出了事情，这些事情才缓缓露出水面。
Later on, those matters were slowly uncovered because something happened to the Ye Family.
之后叶漓的性情大变，从来没有受过这样委屈的她怎么可能忍受的了，为此还和老师吵了一架，便被人传播成了不良学生。

After that, there was a drastic change in Ye Li's character. Since she had never been wronged and aggrieved before, how could she have tolerated it? She even got into an argument with the teacher because of that matter and everyone started calling her a delinquent.
之后她对学校校草排行榜上第二名的于向阳纠缠不清之后，更是被全校人所嫌恶，那评论区的评论，都被癞蛤蟆想吃天鹅肉给刷屏了。

Afterwards, she became obsessed with Yu Xiangyang, who was ranked second on the campus "Handsomest Boy" ranking, and got detested by all students in school. Most of the comments in the comment section were criticizing her for lusting over someone who was out of her league.
之后秦家那边以孩子相逼，非要将秦柔母女送来，叶家碍于颜面，不得已才收了人。
Afterwards, using the child as an excuse, the Qin Family insisted on sending Qin Rou and Ye Mei to the Ye Family. The Ye Family then had no choice but to accept them and take them in.
也不知道是谁偷拍了她的照片，放上了校园贴吧，还将叶眉的照片拿出来对比，一时之间，叶漓遭到了不少嘲笑的目光，成为了大家口中的热门笑话。

Someone secretly took a photo of her and uploaded it onto the campus forum. They even compared it with Ye Mei's picture and all of a sudden, many people looked at Ye Li with mockery and she became a laughing stock and the talk of the town.

再看看周围的粉红色的豪华装饰的房间，她愣住了。

几个像是老婆子般一直劝导的男人闻声一下就闭了嘴，疑惑的对视一眼，便道：“你这丫头，傻了不成，2020年5月23号啊。”

However, she used to comply and pretend that she was pleased with the meals because she felt that it would be inappropriate to defy Qin Rou who had always showed her concern and doted on her.

这辈子她再也不做一个与世无争的女孩，她要做一个魔女，哪怕人人唾之，也要将所有欺负过的自己的人狠狠踩在脚下！
In this life, she would never be a kind-hearted girl again! She would be a demoness who would trample on everyone who bullied her, even if she had to face the criticism of everyone!
这辈子她告诉自己，没关系，一切都可以重来，自己上辈子犯得错，这一世用一辈子来弥补，于是，她拨出了那熟悉的电话。

In this life, she told herself that it didn't matter because she could start anew again and she could atone for all the mistakes that she had made in her previous life. Hence, she dialed the familiar phone number.
那个男人一向沉默寡言，更别说好好解释，因此两人的好不容易缓和的关系再次破裂，叶漓更是拼了命的想要逃离帝家。

His silence and lack of a proper explanation caused their relationship, which had gotten better after a great deal of painstaking efforts, to break down once again. Ye Li desperately wanted to leave the family.
那副情深意切的模样不似作假。
The look of concern and affection on Ye Mei's face seemed genuine.
那时候上叶家依旧很庞大，整个帝都能动的了手的也就只有徐家。
At that time, the Ye Family was still extremely powerful and the Xu Family was the only family in Beijing that could touch them.
镜中的女儿脸很大，还留着厚重的齐刘海儿，土里土气不说，还显得头大。
The girl in the mirror had a large face and thick and neat bangs which not only made her look like unsophisticated, it also made her head look large.
除了有钱，好像是其他的都跟她没什么关系了。
Apart from being wealthy, she did not have any other positive attributes.
难..难不成自己重生了？
'Did... did I get reborn?'
难怪她会冲动的跑去自杀，难怪她会那样恨他们，原来学校里的那群人才是罪魁祸首！
It was no wonder that she had decided to kill herself in a moment of impulse. It turned out that her schoolmates were all culprits!
难道叶漓醒来，又闹了吗？
'Did Ye Li throw a tantrum again after regaining consciousness?'
面对曾经疼爱自己的父亲和哥哥们的各种相逼，同学们的嘲笑，性格极端的她直接跳了学校的池塘，险些淹死。

Faced with all kinds of pressure from her father and brothers, who used to love and dote on her very much, as well as the mockery of her classmates, Ye Li, who had an extreme personality, jumped straight into the pond in school where she almost drowned.
